name: 林筱玫
objective:
本課程之目標在於介紹台灣數位學習現況，並透過數位學習理論的講授以及設計實務的操作，使學生能具備行動裝置應用程式原型的實務開發能力。而互動科技應用於互動學習平台上，含 HTML5、CSS3、RWD、JavaScript 等程式語言，學生能夠熟悉此技能，並且應用於互動網頁的開發。

This course aims to introduce the current situation of Taiwan's digital learning through the teaching of digital learning theory and the implementation of the design practice, which enables students to have practical development capabilities for mobile device application prototypes. Such interactive technology is used in interactive learning platforms, including HTML5, CSS3, RWD, and JavaScript programming languages. Therefore, students are familiar with this skill and apply it to interactive web development.
schedule:
1.	Course Introduction
2.	Introduction to HTML5, Part 1
3.	Introduction to HTML5, Part 2
4.	CSS3, Part 1
5.	CSS3, Part 2
6.	HTML5 Audio, Video, and Animation; Introduction to Canvas
7.	JavaScript- Introduction to Scripting
8.	JavaScript- Control Statements, Part 1
9.	JavaScript- Control Statements, Part 2
10.	Midterm exam
11.	JavaScript- Functions and Arrays
12.	JavaScript- Objects, JSON and JSON Parsing Tools
13.	jQuery 
14.	jQuery Mobile
15.	Basic concepts of Bootstrap
16.	Bootstrap element
17.	Bootstrap responsive web design implementation
18.	Final project demonstration
